Chaos and anarchy would reign as people would not remember their roles, responsibilities, or relationships. This would lead to a breakdown of society and a complete loss of order.
The world would be and empty as people would not remember their homes, families, or friends. This would lead to a complete of the human race.
The economy would as people would not remember their jobs, skills, or knowledge. This would lead to a complete collapse of the global economy.
Scientific and technological advancements would be lost as people would not remember their research, discoveries, or inventions. This would lead to a complete loss of progress and development.

Language and communication would be severely impacted as people would not remember the words, grammar, or syntax of their language. This would lead to a complete breakdown of communication and understanding between people.
